issue.title: parquet StreamWriter TIME support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15225](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15225). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The parquet StreamWriter class is very convenient, but it doesn't have support for the "Time" type.  Can you please look into support some form of a time type for streaming.

As with my other JIRA, please add support for nano time as well.
